org.nuiz.parallelRecommend
Class UserExaminer

java.lang.Object
  org.nuiz.parallelRecommend.UserExaminer

public class UserExaminer
extends java.lang.Object

Gets predictions for a given user after training.

Author:
Robert Newey

Constructor Summary
UserExaminer(DataList dataList, Model model, int user, java.lang.String moviesFile, java.lang.String separator, java.io.OutputStream outputFile)
          Writes predictions to an OutputStream in lines of the form: User number Number of ratings the movie has Predicted (denormalised) user rating Movie title
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

UserExaminer

public UserExaminer(DataList dataList,
                    Model model,
                    int user,
                    java.lang.String moviesFile,
                    java.lang.String separator,
                    java.io.OutputStream outputFile)
             throws java.io.IOException
Writes predictions to an OutputStream in lines of the form:
  • User number
  • Number of ratings the movie has
  • Predicted (denormalised) user rating
  • Movie title

Parameters:
dataList - DataList to train on
model - Model to use
user - User id to predict for
moviesFile - Path to file with movie titles in it.
separator - Separator to use in the moviesFile
outputFile - Where to write output.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
